document.full_text: nolbert kunonga, an excommunicated anglican bishop and mugabe ally, has escalated a drive to control anglican churches and other properties across zimbabwe and southern africa.
document.title: mugabe ally escalates push to control anglican church
lines_and_colors: nolbert kunonga, an excommunicated anglican bishop and mugabe ally, has escalated a drive to control anglican churches and other properties across zimbabwe and southern africa.
